channel.title: One error to new silabsoft! please help asap!
channel.description:
I did everything told in the tut on page two of the tutorial section, and I got one error which was...
[code]client.java:14199: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
So please help ASAP!!

sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } } } public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount > 0) { if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
